# Plots

```{r market plots}


ggplot(raw_SPY, aes(x = as.POSIXct(timestamp, format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", tz = "UTC"), y = close)) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", size = 0.01) +
  labs(title = "SPY Price Over Time",
       x = "Time",
       y = "Close Price") +
   scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b:%d",  
                    date_breaks = "2 day") +
   theme_minimal() +
   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```
